{!header} It's a new year! New Games! We had a bunch of games that were made last year - and even more made this last weekend at the Global Game Jam! Want to participate in a Game Jam or hang out with others in the community? Keep your eyes on the Roundup for announcements about upcoming Game Jams and other events in our area!

{ğŸ¤¹â€â™€ï¸ Global Game Jam 2024} The 2024 Global Game Jam was January 26-28 at Washington University, St Louis. The theme was **Make Me Laugh** There were 19(!) games made at our location over the course of the jam! Try them all out!

{ğŸ¤¹â€â™€ï¸ Global Game Jam 2024} [My King was in Mourning. So I Recruited the Kingdom's Funniest Jester to Cheer Him Up](https://globalgamejam.org/games/2024/my-king-was-mourning-so-i-recruited-kingdoms-funniest-jester-cheer-him-7)
